title: How can I know something is spam if I never picked up?
content:
I receive an inordinate amount of robo calls and spam calls and I find the ability to screen my calls with google to be literally invaluable...

But when calls disconnect before, during, or after the screen I get prompted and asked if the call was spam. 

How do I know these calls are spam if they disconnect? Why would you ask?

My phone labels them as disconnects. Doesn't it already know i never talked to them then?

It is not a big issue, but I hate useless notifications that I have to swipe away.
